biotools.summary: GeMprospector is designed to find cross-species genetic marker candidates in legumes and grasses.  GeMprospector automates PCR primer design based on multiple sequence alignments of submitted ESTs and their homologues in sequence databases from legumes or grasses.

bioschemas.name: GeMprospector
bioschemas.summary: GeMprospector is designed to find cross-species genetic marker candidates in legumes and grasses.  GeMprospector automates PCR primer design based on multiple sequence alignments of submitted ESTs and their homologues in sequence databases from legumes or grasses.
